dreamState: Autonomous, coherent, local-first system that compounds leverage through skill-based ontology

modules.name: skill-registry
modules.description: Core service for skill CRUD operations, search, and improvement capture.

modules.name: loop-composer
modules.description: Compose loops from skills, validate loop definitions, manage loop lifecycle.

modules.name: execution-engine
modules.description: Execute loops with phase management, skill completion tracking, and gate enforcement.

modules.name: memory-service
modules.description: Context persistence, pattern recording, decision tracking, and handoff creation.

modules.name: learning-service
modules.description: Skill improvement proposals, metrics tracking, proposal lifecycle management.

modules.name: calibration-service
modules.description: Effort estimation calibration, accuracy tracking, calibration recommendations.

modules.name: inbox-processor
modules.description: Second brain inbox for capturing content, URL fetching, skill extraction.

modules.name: run-archival
modules.description: Archive completed loop runs, query historical runs, generate run summaries.

modules.name: guarantee-service
modules.description: Register and validate skill guarantees, aggregate loop guarantees, enforce at gates.

modules.name: deliverable-manager
modules.description: Store and retrieve execution deliverables, manage deliverable paths.

modules.name: analytics
modules.description: Collect and aggregate metrics from runs, skills, calibration, gates, patterns.

modules.name: dream-state-service
modules.description: Manage dream state JSON, sync from roadmap, render markdown views.

modules.name: 2-layer-orchestration
modules.description: Orchestrator that spawns and manages sub-agents. One orchestrator per system, capable of spinning up/down any number of agents running any combination of loops to advance toward dream state.

modules.name: knowledge-graph-ontology
modules.description: The skill-based knowledge graph where compound leverage accumulates. Skills, patterns, loops, and learnings form nodes; relationships form edges.

modules.name: roadmapping
modules.description: System-level visibility into module progress, dependencies, and completion status. The spine that makes everything else trackable.

modules.name: autonomous
modules.description: Full loop execution without human gates + background continuous operation. The orchestrator advances dream state while you're away.

modules.name: kanban
modules.description: Linear-style visualization of the module ladder to system completion. Human-readable checklist showing scope completion.

modules.name: loop-sequencing
modules.description: Developing intuition for which loops commonly run together and using that to look multiple moves ahead in the line.

modules.name: multi-agent-worktrees
modules.description: Multiple sets of parallel agents across two hierarchy levels. Coordination when collaborators each have their own agent sets working on isolated git worktrees.

modules.name: ooda-clocks-visual
modules.description: Gamelan-inspired circular visualization showing when patterns, hooks, and skills fire during loop execution.

modules.name: skill-trees
modules.description: DAG-like domain-specific sequences of skills. Interface to the skill-based ontology with progression tracking.

modules.name: coherence-system
modules.description: Alignment of all orchestrator components. Ensures modules don't drift or conflict.

modules.name: mece-opportunity-mapping
modules.description: Mutually Exclusive, Collectively Exhaustive opportunity analysis. Ensures no blind spots in roadmap coverage.

modules.name: patterns-roundup
modules.description: Round up existing patterns not yet formalized, plus automatic pattern detection from observed behaviors.

modules.name: scoring
modules.description: System-level evaluation around module-specific value. Quantifies how much each module contributes to dream state advancement.

modules.name: proactive-messaging
modules.description: System reaches out across channels: terminal, Slack, notifications. Alerts you to completions, proposals, blockers.

modules.name: slack-integration
modules.description: Bidirectional Slack: receive commands and capture to inbox, plus send proactive messages with buttons.

modules.name: voice
modules.description: Text-to-speech output for status updates. MacOS TTS integration with event formatting and quiet hours.

modules.name: knopilot
modules.description: Sales CRM runtime context. Deal management, stakeholder tracking, NBA engine, pipeline intelligence.

updates.description: Guarantee that all commits are rounded up and pushed. No orphaned local commits after distribution completes.
Finish the second brain inbox implementation. Complete the skill harvesting pipeline.

brainstorm.notes: Systematic audit to find gaps in skill coverage
